text:
Websh does not automatically remove files created with web::tempfile anymore.
(Workaround: use [web::tempfile -remove] to remove files amnually w/o having to
track the filenames)
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch

text:
even using [web::tempfile -remove] does not work with directories (probably we
need the -force flag or something ...
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch

text:
Fixed in 3.6.0b4
(But works only if process does not terminate abnormally, which again kind of
makes sense :-)
creator: ronnie.brunner@netcetera.ch
